subject: Yoga
lead_paragraph: Images from the ninth annual Bishnu Charan Ghosh Cup, which was held at the LAX Radisson in Los Angeles, where the mirrored ballroom became a competitive yoga stadium and runway-like hallways morphed into warm-up rooms for yogis.
snippet: Images from the ninth annual Bishnu Charan Ghosh Cup, which was held at the LAX Radisson in Los Angeles, where the mirrored ballroom became a competitive yoga stadium and runway-like hallways morphed into warm-up rooms for yogis.
